job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: What Youll Do As A Software EngineerbrulliUsing our entire technology stack and to develop new features and applications for the Zenput platform including web and mobile UIs commenting and messaging webhooks and APIs as well as expand capabilities in our mobile applicationsliliContribute to and influence design and development decisionsliliWork in an agile environment quickly and incrementally delivering value to our customers using tools from the SCRUM toolbox and using tight feedback loops with customers product and qualityliliMaximize our velocity and minimize risk by using TDDCI and other DevOps best practicesliliUse Jira Slack and Zoom to communicate with your team and leadershipbrliulWhat Were Looking ForbrulliGreat communicator and outstanding team intentional about selfdevelopmentliliEnglish language proficiency at the B2  Upper Intermediate level or greaterliliCSCISSystems MentalityliliAdoption of CI DevOps principles and a focus on methodologies and associated tools amp principlesliliMySQLPostgresRDBMS experience Just using ORMs doesnt countliliAbility to design and implement the right technical solution for the right problem at important to youliliYouve built great relationships with coworkers in the past and want to keep doing itliliYou care similarly about building great software and building great relationships with other
